files.content:
#!/bin/bash

# <bitbar.title>Appearance Options</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>Karl Piper</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>KarlPiper</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Set random desktop image, choose image rotation timing and order. Toggle dark mode. Start screensaver. Set Night Shift warmth level (optional, requires: jenghis/nshift).</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KarlPiper/Plugins-for-Bitbar/master/images/appearance-preview.gif</bitbar.image>
# <bitbar.dependencies>bash</bitbar.dependencies>

# OPTIONS
# generic title "toggle" (false) | "enable/disable" (true) cases bitbar restart
darkModeAltTitle=true
# desktop image folder paths
sfwPath="/Library/Desktop Pictures/Solid Colors/"
nsfwPath="/Library/Desktop Pictures/"
# path to nshift (https://github.com/jenghis/nshift) e.g. nshiftDir="/usr/local/bin/nshift"
nshiftDir="false"

# MENU BAR ICON
# templateImage reacts to dark mode (black transparent tiff 36x36px/144ppi)
echo "| ";
echo "---"

# APPLESCRIPT FUNCTIONS
function changeDesktopImg () {
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "Finder"
		set img to some file of folder (POSIX file "$1") as string
	end tell
	tell application "System Events"
		tell current desktop
			set pictures folder to "$1"
			set picture to img
		end tell
	end tell
EOD
}
function toggleDarkMode () {
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "System Events" to tell appearance preferences
		set dark mode to not dark mode
	end tell
EOD
}
function restartBitBar () {
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "BitBar" to quit
	delay 1
	tell application "BitBar" to activate
EOD
}
function launchScreensaver () {
osascript <<EOD
	try
		tell application id "com.apple.ScreenSaver.Engine" to launch
	end try
EOD
}
function desktopImgRotation () {
# $1 = picture rotation mode (0=off, 1=interval, 2=login, 3=sleep)
# $2 = picture rotation timing (in seconds)
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "System Events"
		tell current desktop
			set picture rotation to "$1"
			set change interval to "$2"
		end tell
	end tell
EOD
}
function checkRotationTiming () {
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "System Events"
		tell current desktop
			get properties
			return change interval
		end tell
	end tell
EOD
}
function checkRandom () {
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "System Events"
		tell current desktop
			get properties
			return random order
		end tell
	end tell
EOD
}
function toggleRandomOrder () {
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "System Events"
		tell current desktop
			get properties
			set random order to not random order
		end tell
	end tell
EOD
}
function nightShift () {
osascript <<EOD
	set nshiftOptions to { 0, 25, 50, 75, 100 }
	set nshiftDialog to (choose from list nshiftOptions with prompt "Choose warmth level:" default items "0" with title "Night Shift Settings")
	if nshiftDialog is not false then
		do shell script "$nshiftDir" & " " & nshiftDialog
		return
	end if
EOD
}

# DARK MODE STATUS
BitBarDarkMode=${BitBarDarkMode}
if [[ "$BitBarDarkMode" ]]; then
	isDark=true
else
	isDark=false
fi

# MENU ITEM HANDLERS
if [[ "$1" = "darkMode" ]]; then
	if "$darkModeAltTitle" = true ; then
		toggleDarkMode;
		restartBitBar;
	else
		toggleDarkMode;
	fi
fi

if [[ "$1" = "desktop" ]]; then
  if [[ "$2" = "sfw" ]]; then
		changeDesktopImg "$sfwPath";
	elif [[ "$2" = "nsfw" ]]; then
		changeDesktopImg "$nsfwPath";
	fi
fi

if [[ "$1" = "rotation" ]]; then
	desktopImgRotation "$2" "$3";
	checkRandom;
elif [[ "$1" = "random" ]]; then
	toggleRandomOrder;
elif [[ "$1" = "nightShift" ]]; then
	nightShift;
elif [[ "$1" = "screensaver" ]]; then
	launchScreensaver;
fi

# MENU ITEMS
echo "üèû Set Wallpaper"
echo "--üèî SFW| bash='$0' param1=desktop param2=sfw terminal=false";
echo "--üåã NSFW| bash='$0' param1=desktop param2=nsfw terminal=false";
echo "--Rotation"

if [[ $(checkRotationTiming) = "300.0" ]]; then
	echo "----Disable| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=0 param3=1.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
	echo "----‚úì 5 min| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=1 param3=300.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
	echo "----1 hr| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=1 param3=3600.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
elif [[ $(checkRotationTiming) = "3600.0" ]]; then
	echo "----Disable| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=0 param3=1.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
	echo "----5 min| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=1 param3=300.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
	echo "----‚úì 1 hr| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=1 param3=3600.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
else
	echo "----5 min| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=1 param3=300.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
	echo "----1 hr| bash='$0' param1=rotation param2=1 param3=3600.0 terminal=false refresh=true";
fi
echo "-------"
if $(checkRandom) = true; then
	echo "----‚úì Random| bash='$0' param1=random terminal=false refresh=true";
else
	echo "----Random| bash='$0' param1=random terminal=false refresh=true";
fi

if "$darkModeAltTitle" = true; then
	if "$isDark" = true; then
		echo "üåî Go Light| bash='$0' param1=darkMode terminal=false";
	else
		echo "üåò Go Dark| bash='$0' param1=darkMode terminal=false";
	fi
else
	echo "üåò Toggle Dark Mode| bash='$0' param1=darkMode terminal=false";
fi

echo "üåÄ Start Screensaver| bash='$0' param1=screensaver terminal=false";

if [[ "$nshiftDir" != false ]]; then
	echo "üí§ Night Shift| bash='$0' param1=nightShift terminal=false";
fi

plugins.title: Appearance Options
plugins.author: Karl Piper
plugins.desc: Set random desktop image, choose image rotation timing and order. Toggle dark mode. Start screensaver. Set Night Shift warmth level (optional, requires: jenghis/nshift).

files.content:
#!/bin/bash

# <bitbar.title>Refresh Me</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>Karl Piper</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>KarlPiper</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>How to refresh just one plugin, or restart BitBar entirely.</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KarlPiper/Plugins-for-Bitbar/master/images/refresh.png</bitbar.image>
# <bitbar.dependencies>bash</bitbar.dependencies>

if [[ "$1" = "restart" ]]; then
osascript <<EOD
	tell application "BitBar" to quit
	delay 1
	tell application "BitBar" to activate
EOD
fi

echo "‚Üª"
echo "---"
echo "Refresh Me| terminal=false refresh=true"
echo "Restart Bitbar| bash='$0' param1=restart terminal=false";

plugins.title: Refresh Me
plugins.author: Karl Piper
plugins.desc: How to refresh just one plugin, or restart BitBar entirely.
